Welcome to Clt-Langlabs’s documentation!¶

Clt-Langlabs project is the code base for BRIX system. BRIX is an online learning platform for language teaching, and it used within College of Languages, Linguistics, and Literature, University of Hawaii at Manoa.

Support¶

Please contact our IT specialist Richard Medina if you have more questions about it or you found any security issues that need to be fixed.
